quotes.quote: Where we have strong emotions, we're liable to fool ourselves.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: When dealing with people, let us remember we are not dealing with creatures of logic. We are dealing with creatures of emotion, creatures bustling with prejudices and motivated by pride and vanity.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: The sign of an intelligent people is their ability to control emotions by the application of reason.
quotes.author: Marya Mannes

quotes.quote: Feelings are really your GPS system for life. When your supposed to do something, or not supposed to do something, your emotional guidance system lets you know.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The advantage of the emotions is that they lead us astray, and the advantage of science is that it is not emotional.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Cherish your own emotions and never undervalue them.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: When you're eighteen your emotions are violent, but they're not durable.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham
